Module io.helidon.security
Package io.helidon.security.spi

Interface SecretsProvider<T extends ProviderConfig>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the custom configuration object
    All Superinterfaces:
    SecurityProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigVaultProvider, CubbyholeSecurityProvider, Kv1SecurityProvider, Kv2SecurityProvider, OciVaultSecurityProvider
    public interface SecretsProvider<T extends ProviderConfig>
extends SecurityProvider
    Provider that can retrieve secrets.
